item.title: PRIME PASSAGES
item.description:
PRIME PASSAGES

Genesis 3:20: “He named his wife Eve because she was the mother of all living.” Evolution

pictures descent as a group process instead of something that derives from one

pair of individuals.

Genesis 3:22: “Man has become like one of us.” Trinity in the Old Testament.

Cp. also Isaiah 6:8.

Exodus 3:14: God’s self-existence (aseity). “I am because I am.” He is independent being; there

is no higher frame of reference than God.
